meanings.definition: Of or relating to a goose
meanings.sent1: The anserine feathers of the goose kept it warm in the cold water.
meanings.sent2: The anserine migration patterns of geese are fascinating to observe.
meanings.sent3: The anserine honking of the geese made the children giggle.
meanings.sent4: The anserine grace of the geese as they landed on the lake was a sight to behold.
meanings.sent5: The anserine nature of geese is evident in their strong sense of community.

meanings.sent1: His anserine idea to wear shorts in the snow quickly backfired.
meanings.sent2: She couldn't help but laugh at his anserine antics during the party.
meanings.sent3: The anserine dance moves of the clown entertained the audience.
meanings.sent4: Ignoring the warnings was an anserine decision that led to trouble.
meanings.sent5: The anserine behavior of the puppy chasing its tail brought smiles to everyone's faces.
